Author: fishonthesun
Text: Thank you so much- it honestly helps to know that someone else went through something similar, that I'm not some sort of outlier.  I think the worst part is that my brother is taking care of me and wont let me not eat at least twice a day so part of the binge was feeling out of control about y body and wanting to have some type of control. And then regretting it badly

Author: withextracheesepls
Text: god i feel this, i binged the entire week following getting my wisdom teeth out AND they had been impacted so i was in a lot of pain. i wasn’t even binging on soft foods. i ate like, super crunchy cookies and shit that hurt very badly to chew.   and i’m a dumb bitch so i also purged some of those days, starting like just a few days after getting them out lmaoo no wonder they got infected.   it’s gonna be okay i promise, binge cycle doesn’t last forever, i got out and i genuinely believe you will too even if i don’t know you. i’m sorry you’re having a bad day and that you’re in pain, i hope you can start taking your antidepressants soon and feel better :(  my pms are open if you ever need anyone, it rlly wouldn’t bother me at all and sometimes it’s nice to vent to someone anonymous. i understand if not though, talking to strangers about stuff like this can make it feel worse too- but the option is there, if you ever need it.
